content.description:
Easy slab climb left of Pistol and Holster. Head up an easy and featured slab. Four bolts to a two bolt anchor with rings.

I'm unsure of the FA but noticed the route was not on mountain project.
content.protection: Four bolts to a two bolt anchor
content.location: Low angle slab on the other side of the dihedral left of Pistol and Holster.

content.description: You'll find the crux between the first and second bolts then to some fun moves above.
content.location: 3rd route on right on the wall just to the west of the Pronghorn Pinnacle.  There is a small group of pine trees in front of the wall.

content.description: Short climb with pocket moves.  Not a good spot for belayer to stand or to spot the climber.  Mantle up onto the summit for a look around to make this climb worth it.
content.location: on west face of the Pronghorn Pinnacle that sits in front of the cliff.  In the "Pronghorn Pinnacle" section to the right of La Vaca Wall

content.description: Climb thin and technical slab past 3 bolts to anchors
content.location: From Ticks for Chicks, walk left along the base of the cliff. As of July 2015, this is the first route right of Pronghorn Pinnacle.

content.description: The better route to climb Pronghorn Pinnacle.  Climb big pockets via awkward movement to a hidden jug and the anchors.
content.location: East (climber's right) side of Pronghorn Pinnacle.  Most easily approached from Ticks For Chicks.

content.description: Fairly typical route with some pockets and face climbing. Crux is just around the first bolt where the wall is slippery (preclipping the first bolt could be useful particularly for shorter people). Pull yourself over a small shelf after the first bolt to find more nice pockets.
content.protection: About 4 bolts. Two bolt anchor with rap rings.
content.location: Middle route of three on the wall just left of the Pronghorn Pinnacle. Route to the right is Saddle Up.

content.description: Left-most route on wall with three climbs:  Britchen Strap, Licorice Stick, Saddle Up.  Best and longest route on the wall

pathTokens: 3. Right Side (Diamonds, La Vaca, Pronghorn, Rodeo Drive)
